Name: Consolidate Release Notes
Description: Consolidates all Release Notes between the last successful release in the current Environment and this one by merging or concatenating them.
Author: damovisa

Parameters.Name: Consolidate_ApiKey
Parameters.Label: Api Key
Parameters.HelpText: The API Key to use for authentication

Parameters.Name: Consolidate_Dedupe
Parameters.Label: Remove Duplicates
Parameters.HelpText: Whether to remove **duplicate** lines when constructing release notes

Parameters.Name: Consolidate_RemoveWhitespace
Parameters.Label: Remove Blank Lines
Parameters.HelpText: Whether to remove **blank** lines when constructing release notes

Parameters.Name: Consolidate_Order
Parameters.Label: Concatenation Order
Parameters.HelpText: The order in which to append release notes

DisplaySettings.Octopus.SelectOptions:
Newest|Newest to Oldest
Oldest|Oldest to Newest
